SuccessEvent.Description: もしそうなら、彼らは目的地まで気の遠くなる程長い時間を泳ぎ続けるのだろう。@{M}If so, they will be swimming a long time to get to their destination.
SuccessEvent.Name: 悲哀蜘蛛は泳げるのか?@{M}$[Ss]orrow-spider -> 悲哀蜘蛛$Can sorrow-spiders swim?

DefaultEvent.Description: もしそうなら、彼らは目的地まで気の遠くなる程長い時間を泳ぎ続けるのだろう。残念な事に、揉め事無しで彼らが先に進む事は無いだろうが。@{M}If so, they will be swimming a long time to get to their destination. Unfortunately they don't go without something of a fight.
DefaultEvent.Name: 悲哀蜘蛛は泳げるのか?@{M}$[Ss]orrow-spider -> 悲哀蜘蛛$Can sorrow-spiders swim?

ChildBranches.Name: 船外に投げ出せ!@{M}Throw them overboard!
ChildBranches.Description: この船の何処にも悲哀蜘蛛の居るべき場所はない。@{M}$[Ss]orrow-spider -> 悲哀蜘蛛$There is no place for sorrow-spiders on this vessel.

SuccessEvent.Description: 毒袋を最初に処理さえしてしまえば、船員は受け入れるだろう。@{M}The crew will accept that. As long as the poison sacs are removed first.
SuccessEvent.Name: 誰も聞かないなら、食料にしよう@{M}If anyone asks, it's foreign cuisine

DefaultEvent.Description: 毒袋を最初に処理さえしてしまえば、船員は受け入れるだろう。彼らは、悲哀蜘蛛に刺された船員の末路を知っている。@{M}$[Ss]orrow-spider -> 悲哀蜘蛛$The crew will accept that. As long as the poison sacs are removed first. They saw what happened to the crew member the sorrow-spiders managed to sting.
DefaultEvent.Name: 誰も聞かないなら、食料にしよう@{M}If anyone asks, it's foreign cuisine

ChildBranches.Name: 料理人は満足だろう@{M}The cook will be pleased
ChildBranches.Description: 他の船員はそうでも無さそうだが。@{M}The rest of the crew, perhaps not so much.

Description: 恩人ヶ岩から持ってきた箱がいきなり爆散し、卵から孵った悲哀蜘蛛の大群が現れて来た時は...驚きという言葉では済まされない程のものがあった。@{M}$[Ss]orrow-spider -> 悲哀蜘蛛, Saviour's Rocks -> 救い主の岩礁$When the crate from Saviour's Rocks explodes into an infestation of prematurely hatched sorrow-spiders... it does not entirely come as a surprise.
Name: 一体何を持ってきたんだ?@{M}Trinkets? Just Trinkets?
